name: Kilka Card Gods
description:
Kilka Card Gods is an amazingly addictive card game like no other you’ve ever played before, fusing together the best of Sudoku and card strategy into one amazing package. Simple to play yet hard to master, you’ll need to place your cards in the correct spaces on a grid and against the clock. Place the correct card and you’ll earn some extra time but place the wrong card and precious seconds will slip away.

Packed with endless challenges, a deep story mode, exotic locations and cast of colorful characters, Kilka Card Gods is a puzzle game that will bring you hours of enjoyment.

1 player(s)
10240KB Minimum
